content.detailedDescription: Me and several friends where outside talking when a brilliant orange colored fireball flew across the sky,at first i thought it was a meteor as we have very many of those in the desert i live about 45 minutes away from phoenix so i see much more because city lights dont wash out the sky,but this fireball flew completely horizontal not at a angle like falling meteors it continued that way for quite awhile until it just seemed to disapear being 18 at the time i really didnt pay much attention to it until about 30 minutes later when my brother and  friend shouted "look" the way he shouted really startled me it took a few seconds to scan he sky but than i spotted it,the object was made up of about 6 o 7 lights shaped in the form of a triangle slowly moving above the municipal airport now i know what i saw and so did my brother and several others and those werent no military flares we stood there in total disbelief it was so close. it continued  off in a westerly direction toward california until i lost sight of it it was wierd because it kind of hummed and the air became kind of tense i cant say what it was but i know it couldnt be man made
content.summary: Phoenix lights

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving to the wilkes-barre/scranton airport in avoca, pa. at approximately 11:00 am. my friend was driving,i was in the passenger seat, and my 4 yr old son was in the car seat in the back seat of the car. when we were on 81 north  outside of wilkes-barre, my friend told me to look in the sky outside his window and tell him what i saw- i had observed him looking at something outside his window and was wondering what he was focused on. i looked out the front windshield by ducking down a little bit and saw a black object in the sky-it looked like a pyramid that was rounded where the points are and the sides looked slightly concave. i was mesmerized by the sight and my friend was relieved that i saw it, as he thought he was going crazy. we kept on trying to explain it as something like a plane,balloon, etc since we were close to the airport, but those explanations didn't fit. it seemed to keep pace with us as we drove 55mph down the highway and i kept wondering if other people saw it, as it was a beautiful morning and the object was very clear and visible. we kept watching and driving and then it shot away extremely fast and was out of site in seconds. it appeared to follow the susquehanna river north towards the tunkhannock, pa area. we were kind of freaked out that we actually saw a ufo. i kept telling people about it, but my friend got mad and started denying it in front of others-he said he didn't want others to think we were crazy. we still talk about it with each other and it still freaks us out.
content.summary: While driving to the airport we saw a black pyramid shaped object in the sky while driving on  81 north on a beautiful clear day.

content.detailedDescription: Me my little sis and her frend were out side in our yard looking at the stars and i sow one that was witeish blue and looked like it was moving so the first thing that i thought was that it was aircraft from the airport but the more that we watched the more we realised that it was no way it could be from the airport or human it moved in a circlular moshen slowely we got scaird and ran inside and got my dad to come and look and he saw the same thing so we watched it for about 30 mins and after a wile we got tired and went to bed but i have never seen somthing like it in my life i am certan that this is a u.F.O.
content.summary: It looked like a star

content.detailedDescription:
Ann had just arrived home and was going to change her clothes when her husband who was watching tv in the living room with the lights off shouted to her to look out the window at the light he saw appear.

it is a very clear view from the living room straight out the window to the mountain in front of our house.

she looked out the window and saw a white ball of light the size of a quarter flying rapidly from the sw of the mountain in front of her house about 300 yards in the sky and about half a mile away.

the object flew very rapidly, faster than a jet, to the n, and partly downward towards the mountain before it disappeared in front of their eyes before it reached the mountain.

it was the first ufo her husband had ever seen and he was amazed. ann was very casual about seeing it.

ann has had so many ufo sightings they are commonplace to her. she enjoys seeing them but not excited at all.
content.summary: A white ball of light flew across sky

content.detailedDescription: Two and a half years ago we were driving back to panama city from mexico beach at 4:30 in the afternoon. the direction was west and there were no clouds in the sky. we were on route 98 that goes through a forest preserve and past tyndall afb. the gulf of mexico was on the left and further to the right was the airbase. the road paralleled the runway. it's probably important to note the road was long straight and surrounded by the forest of pine trees. through the trees to the right near the ground i saw something move. it was silver and big and "floating" towards the road in front of us. it was also rising so my first thought was weather balloon. we were a couple miles from main base itself so that seemed liked a possibility. then the best thing happened, we came to a clearing in the woods. now i had a good view and a perspective of its size with the pine trees behind it. at this point we're about 1000 feet away and getting closer fast. it has been rising steeply and slowly and never crossed in front of us. it was an orb that was at least 30 feet in diameter. i focused on it and saw it very clearly. it was a silver tone but not too shiny. around it was a thin faint aura that seemed to help it blend in with the blue sky. there were no sharp edges or features on the surface. just a perfect ball. the thing that fascinated me most was that the surface was not a solid color of silver. it was modeled with slightly darker silver and it was swirling. maybe a little bit like molten metal would look. it very briefly stopped at least 300 feet above the trees and then quicker than a blink it shot off. it looked like it instantly reached 1000+ miles an hour. the direction was exactly straight ahead from my view and up at maybe at a 20 degree angle which paralleled the runway further ahead. i'm sure it got smaller as it shot off in the distance. but wait. immediately after it was gone i had a second thought. if it got smaller (shrank) instantly it would have looked exactly the same. maybe it was a portal like a door that closed around it as it slipped into another dimension. i never resolved in my mind which method it used. after seeing this i had a deep feeling of gladness. finally, i got to see a real ufo.
content.summary: Saw silver orb near tyndall afb

content.detailedDescription: I observed deep amber lights that hovered and finally displaying huge deep amber to orange light masses like they wanted to let me know of their presence. they presented themselves a few minutes before the boom. i ran into the house to see if my boyfriend was ok and i was terrified after what i just observed. my first impression was that something crashed or was shot down because i could hear heavy plane traffic and heavy activity of these amber colored lights. as i was walking back to my back door, i could see off to the west of me in the middle of a field some glowing amber orange lights slowly approaching my position and while i was observing, they put out a beautiful display of sequencing light display and little balls of deep amber projecting off one of them. i was afraid but i captured on camcorde and mufon was contacted and are analizing my tape at present.The night after i camcorde another similar display and i contacted our local mufon rep.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Camcorded event before and after boom

content.detailedDescription: I was approaching the city of frederick when i noticed something that didn't look like a plane or helicopter in the sky. it was completely stationary for approximately ten minutes before slowly moving off and out of site. during  the ten minutes i got the impression that it was metallic and was reflecting the light from the sun. the object slowly faded from sight several times during my observations, but reappeared in the same spot. i only moved  about 3/4 of a mile during my viewing because i was stuck in traffic. i only wish i was able to get closer, so i would have gotten a better id.
content.summary: Strange object refecting sunlight hovering stationary above frederick for aprox ten minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok the objects showed back up again at 10:15pm and 10:30pm then that was it for the night.

i'm including a snapshot of the webpage and heres the link.
http://www.Hazecam.Net/baltimore/widelarge.Html#
content.summary: Last photos of baltimore webcams

content.detailedDescription:
These photos are a continuance from the last posting.
the craft moved west into the northwest webcam view at 9:00pm
then in the craft disappears from view in the 9:15 and 9:30 pm snap shots but shows back up in the northwest cam in 9:45pm with the small craft in the northeast webcam.
content.summary: More baltimore webcam photos

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a web cam watcher and two objects came into view of the baltimore md web cams last night.
one of the long line looking objects is very large or long maybe 500 to 1000 ft long hard to judge distance but take a look and you will see its very large.

the objects start off coming into view from the northeast web cam then over the next 45 minutes move west and come into view on the northwest web cam. the first view is on the northwest webcam at 8:30pm then the next shot is at 8:45pm and this shows that the object is in the camera view for over 15 minutes then move into view in the northwest web cam after another 15 minutes.

these are real-time digital images in high quality (no time lapse).

i did some research to see if they maybe time lapse but they are not, the images are real-time photos.

i've highlighted a couple of the images to make it easy to see.
this is not the first time i have seen these craft over baltimore, i have pictures of similar craft from nov of 2007 but did not report those.

there are web cams all over the us and world for that matter and its very easy to spot ufo craft, you just have to look around but its hard to watch them all at once.
content.summary: Objects caught on webcam in baltimore last night

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 of my friends was walking from fairfeild to albion illinois on friday the 18th,the time was 4:30 we would walk for 20 minutes and take a 5 minute breather, while taking a break, i look up in the sky and notice "a bright star" or so i thougt, moving in a very unique way, in no way any airplane or other man made flying machine could every move through the skies. this "ship" was moving slow in one direction, then speeding up, and then turning back the same way it came. after examining this thing for a while, i made up my mind that it was somthing out of explanation, and after panning the skies, it became clear to me that there was more than one, i counted at one time in the sky more than 5 of these blinking lights. but i kept my eye on the biggest brightest one, at one point the one i kept track of stopped, i watched for about 15 seconds and then a red dot appeard miles away from the ship and in an instant both objects dissapeard, and in seconds the ship was back, and at one point the big ship was stopped and a little ship beamed a light to the big one, and when that happend the sky lit up. i felt scared, but i was amazed at what i was seeing at the same time. we kept walking, and i might add i tried to get my friends to look at these things in the sky but when they would look they just kept saying i dont see anything and wouldnt take the time to look very long. so we were walking and an elderly man pulled over to the side of the road, i asked if i could use his phone, he said yes, and when i took the phone i said "not to sound weird or anything but do you believe in aliens?" and told him what i saw and made him look. he too didnt see anything becouse he didnt take the damn time to actually look at what i was pointing at. and when i said sumthin about aliens, he told me there was had been an earthquake that shook the midwest, about 10 minutes ago. the whole time me and my friends were walking we didnt feel anything shake at all, and this earthquake was a 5.4 the biggest recorded in the midwest. so while the whole midwest region was feeling the ground shake, i was experiencing the most shocking time of my life. if anyone seen anything like what i saw that night of the earthquake please say so, becouse i know it wasnt just me who seen these things, they were out from 4:30 till the sun came up, there had to been more ppl to witness this
content.summary: It looked like a really bright star, with blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on the rim of the world highway (18) between lake gregory and lake arrowhead and i spotted a very large glowing whit object at about my one o' clock position - which i suppose would be east southeast. i would project that the object was over 7,000 feet in altitude and when compared to surrounding jets, i would say that it was about four or five times larger. the object didn't appear to reflect sunlight, but rather it seemed to glow and it was as bright as the sun. i have seen sunlight reflect off many planes, but this object had no signs of a tail, wings, cockpit or anything else indicative of a jet. i became alarmed as well as two of my passengers in my car so i pulled off the highway and ran to get a better view. we could no longer see or track the object - this was ten to twenty seconds later.

i would say that the object was in a more or less a "tear" shape. with the small side going forward (to the west). this thing was very, very bright and left no tail and moved relatively slowly and steadily. it didn't seem like a plane at all.
content.summary: Large, bright white ufo spotted over san bernardino

content.detailedDescription:
Im sorry its taken me so long to report this to anyone, i knew what saw, but i just didnt know or who, who to report it to.  \
       i was around 12 years old and my mother was driving our dodge van back home to wakefield, mass. from boston, when i saw (it was either over the prudential tower, or the john hancock building) (sorry i cant remember),but it was a very long, cigar shaped object, but with squared off ends, with almost square like windows all along it, absolutley not a plane,very squared off,  it was dark grey. moving at a slow pace, while a jumbo jet was flying above, what i remember to be the john hancock building, had to make a sharp and very obvious turn to avoid it.  the ufo flew off very fast.  my mother saw it also, and was amazed.  it was not any earthly vessal we have ever seen, and because the jet plane took such evasive action to avoid it, tells me it wasnt any planed flight by any earthly organization.  this is a vision that will stay with me for the rest of my life.
content.summary: Very long cigar shaped, but with squared off ends, not round

content.detailedDescription: Listen i've been watching sightings in indiana mount up for at least 6 weeks now. go back and look at the database you'll see. you have to understand that these sightings started in oct '07 another one was in nov. someone got film on youttube from jan. it's poor but it's there. march 6th give or take was when the sightings really started to roll in. every week sense then there have been sightings. in lafayette, denver in, kokomo, tipton...... anyway i sent a friend up there to investigate and he saw something as well. the sonic boom..... that was on the news up there was the night before the earthquake. i have no doubt that these are connected. i've been checking everyday.... like i said and nearly pooped myself when i woke up this morning with earthquake all over my e-mail from my in contacts. this is huge.
content.summary: Indiana go outside and take film!

content.detailedDescription: At 6:45pm i was looking at the north sky, cloud formations, with my new high powered binoculars. i saw what looked like five birds making tight circles. i first thought buzzards but i estimated their altitude at 35-40,000 altitude based on their size in comparison to commercial jet planes flying over denver. when i zoomed in on them they didn't get much bigger, which tells me they were very  high in altitude. i watched them for 15 minutes and wondered if they were remote controlled model airplanes because the wings never flapped and the circles they were flying were so tight and close together. then these five objects formed a straight line for about thirty seconds and disappeared in the blink of an eye. they appeared to be black in color. when they formed the straight line they were stationary, something i do not believe a bird can do. i scanned the sky for another thirty minutes but never saw them again. they were not visible to the naked eye. when i was looking at the cloud formations i was surprised to see " birds" flying. what in the heck did i see? i was sitting at my desk working on the computer when i saw some interesting cloud formations and decided to look at them through the binoculars.
content.summary: 5 objects circling in the n.W. sky 35-40,000 ft. altitude,

content.detailedDescription: By the u of u, looking up, a large triangular craft appeared, seemingly from out of the void of space. it had one blue light on each point of the triangle and a dim blue light that outlined the craft connecting all three points. it appeared, then slew off silently and swiftly across the sky in a southerly direction.   the next night from same local another craft appeared, this time it was around dusk. the craft entered my line of site as i was again looking upward. this one was also a triangle but not symmetrical like the other. it was an elongated triangle,  very long, very high up and must have been enormous. objects like passenger airliners at those altitudes appear very tiny. this appeared several times longer and wider than that. it was comprised of twenty or so orange points of light and moved swiftly and silently as if it were on a track. it was moving due north.  i have had several sightings in my life, many were quite profound, but never had two nights in a row like this.
content.summary: Looking up at a specific spot in sky when out sprang a luminous craft. it suddenly flew off silently and with incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription:
To those in indiana please get photos and try to video tape all the events happening there. your area has been chosen as the new hot spot for activity.

we all want to see whats going on out your way.
they will be back tonight as usually a flap lasts about a week or two and they will return to the same area.
now that they know people and media are watching they will show up again.
please record these events like they did in stephenville tx and post the pictures or videos on here.
content.summary: People in indiana get photos and videos of events the ufos will be back tonight.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving and saw movements in speed and light with the sky that seemed unusual.  a ball-like light dropped from one of the clouds fast and then stayed stationary as it became brighter and more fuzzy while it changed shape at the edges.  you could see pieces of the cloud that broke off as it came down.  we began to drive toward it and then it just became smaller until it was gone as if it sucked itself inside of a particle with a flash.  we were in a sort of trance that might have been because of the driving and thought nothing of it until a few days later.  we cannot remember if we were in new mexico or texas, but it was near the boarder.
content.summary: Blurry ball of light drops from a cloud, gets brighter, and takes off

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunday mid-morning in denver and i was playing in a baseball game a the metropolitan state college baseball feild. i was playing center field. the feild is located just a few streets west from downtown denver. i was looking toward home plate(which faces west) when i looked up to see the 2 silver balls just sitting stationary near the low white bits of clouds that where scattered that day. it was a very blue sky with pretty white puffy clouds hanging here and there. i kept looking at them in between pitches. they were perfectly alined and just stayed that way. when i looked at them at one point, there was another object that caught my eye just to the right of where they were. it was darting in and out of a small puffy cloud and was boomerang shaped. it was as white as the cloud. the quickness was impressive to watch. i tried to get the other 2 outfielders to look at this , but the ball kept getting hit to all of us(bad day for the pitcher). being it turned out to be a long inning i had more time to watch. this continued for about 15 mins and then the white boomerang just took off at an incredible rate of speed towards the northwest. directly towards the city of boulder. it just disappeard in the distance. the 2 silver balls started to move west (toward the mountains very slow like 2 balloons. they also got too far to see. my family has some history with abduction stories and sightings that go pretty far back. i now understand the stories i was hearing after all these years.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 stationary silver balls aligned perfect to south in sky and boomerang(white) darting in and out of clouds.

content.detailedDescription: 04-14-2008, @12:10:17 pm. (derived from the exif data of the first picture.) approximate location was the city of mchenry, illinois, the intersection of routes 31 and bull valley road, and traveling south from there, approximately one quarter mile. as i was walking down my driveway to check my mailbox, i saw what seemed to be a kite or windblown scarf, brilliant orange and darker orange in color, it was slowly moving toward me traveling from north to south very slowly, size at the time appeared to be no more than maybe four feet in any direction. i did not observe it intensely because it had a motion as though moving up and down as if tethered by a string from the ground, the speed of the oscillations were approximately three or four cycles per second, the range of motion restrained to about twice it���s physical size. the odd motion had me ready to grab for my pocket sony camera that i keep with me,  but still not enough to trigger a reaction to take an image, ���no need to waste memory card space���, i thought. i continued on to check the mail, it had not come yet, when i looked to see where ���the kite��� was located, all my internal alarms went off, the object was now abreast of me, it���s path seemed to be about 200 feet west of me, but i had no reference to gauge it's actual size, and it was never directly over me, it was clear to me that something strange was happening, the ���thing��� was rising up while still traveling due south, now directly west of my position, and abreast of me, any sense of its size was now lost, it may have been much larger than my initial estimate. it is worth noting that the bizarre appearance and motion of the orange object matched nothing in my mental catalog of known objects, it is almost impossible to even describe it accurately because it looked so strange, it had sharp angles and curves and as it was rising in front of me, it's motions were so fast as to cause it to be a blur as it was close to my position. the motion at this angle were now a horizontal back and forth, as it was rising, same frequency of cycles per second as noted before, about three of four times per second, and still rapidly rising. i did grab my camera, got it turned on, as i lifted it up, the lcd screen was completely washed out by the brilliant sunlit sky, i had to approximate the correct direction, the camera is set in bracket mode, it will take a series of three frames, each with a different exposure, one overexposed, one optimized, and one underexposed, usually at least one will be usable, and you can make an hdr image by combining all three together. as i depressed the shutter button, the multi hued orange ���thing���, abruptly faded out within one second, an extremely brilliant strangely hued point source of light popped into view slightly to the south of the orange colored object at the same instant, as the first orange colored one dissolved, the bright light appeared. the distance between the two objects locations was about the size of my fist held at arm���s length. upon examining the camera images i saw that i did capture the light points but they are quite underwhelming compared to the impact of the actual event. the sony cameras lens was set to minimum zoom which is 38mm, the average 35mm cameras lens would be 50mm, this means my camera (a sony dsc t9), was set to a fish eye setting as opposed to a zoomed in setting, this makes the light i saw too small and far away looking to provide images with high detail. the light had an odd purplish blue cast to it a little bit like a welders arc, but strangely different,  to my amazement, this small yet powerfully bright light began immediately moving up and away now traveling southwest an unknown distance, in just a second, it paused in its apparent movement and ascension, but then engaged in a series of severe and rapid saw tooth type oscillations, occurring within a second, while staying within an imaginary box, the size of which i could not guess due to a lack of references pertaining to size and distance. i was taking pictures all the time, there is a delay of several seconds as the three shots are written to the memory card and then it will take another series of three. the point source light then either dimmed or moved away at an incredibly fast rate, leaving again in a steep vertical climb, with a slight southwest direction of travel. my initial reaction as it disappeared from sight was that the thing i had just witnessed was very unusual and most likely not caused by any natural phenomenon i an familiar with, the rapid oscillations were so fast that i saw a streaking or elongating effect that happens with fast moving very luminous objects viewed with my naked eye. i would say the after image (the streaking effect.), behind the light source was very noticeable, like rapidly waving a glowing stick of incense in the dark. my impression of what it was is mixed, the first manifestation looked like something solid, but it moved erratically, it seemed to have a physical presence. when the point source of light appeared, it is hard to imagine anything moving so erratically could be moving under intelligent control, the motions were just so extreme. why would such radical motions be part of its operation or function, it does not make sense. i took pictures, but they are only of use to someone with some computer graphics background, i think someone with some photoshop skills could overlay some of the pictures and show the trajectory that the object took as it moved away. there are background objects in enough of the frames that they can be overlaid to show the differing locations of the light as time elapsed. the digital images do not show any streaking caused by the rapid motion, perhaps because of the bright conditions, the automatic settings most likely would have selected a very fast shutter speed on the camera, or it could be that the object happened to be moving at a slower speed at the moment the frames were taken. the pictures have no value to the casual observer, as far as the wow factor goes. but the testimony i give is honest and true. my flickr account has the images here. http://flickr.Com/photos/ring0/sets/72157604542071914/ there are 21 images in all. they are of very low usefulness for the casual viewer, no craft are seen, only a hard to see point of light in most of them, the last few images show none, but i included all the frames that i took that day.
content.summary: Bright orange object, wildly oscilating changes into a bright point of light.

content.detailedDescription:
There is a big coverup going on here in indiana.
to many people seeing ufo's and military jets, and booms that shake houses, ground shaking earthquakes and objects falling from the sky.
is there a battle going on between ufos and military aircraft? or are there just objects falling out of the sky and hit the ground so hard it feels like an earthquake?

wtf is going on here?


http://www.Theindychannel.Com/news/15907638/detail.Html
http://www.Theindychannel.Com/news/15921725/detail.Html#

look around you will find reports all over the place.
its on all the news channels
content.summary: Coverup going on in indiana - either ufo and or military related

content.detailedDescription:
This is becoming a daily event. i was outside having a smoke break and as usual i was scanning the skies to see if i could find any of the star-like ufo's that i have been seeing on a daily basis here in phoenix, but i didn't see anything like that at all. as i turned to go back in the building i looked up one last time and this time i saw two very distinct round or possibly disc shaped ufo's flying side-by-side, heading from west to east at a fast rate of speed. they never wavered in the distance between the two of them as they were flying along either - just rock steady. if anyone else in phoenix is seeing these things - please email me and let me know what you are seeing too. i just can't believe that i am seeing ufo's every single day now...What is going on ? 

thanks for listening - 

john in phoenix

email - dporter4@cox.Net - or - john.Birmingham@moneymanagement.Org
content.summary: I saw 2 ufo's flying side-by-side

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30 p.M. on the night of april 16 i was in the livingroom watching tv, and my husband had gone to bed.  there was a huge boom that rattled the front window.  my husband asked what the noise was, and i went to the front door to see.  off to the west there appeared a large object with lights all the way across it.  it reminded me of a hair barrette with lights. it seemed to be hovering, yet the lights appeared to turn.  my husband came out to stand behind me just in time to see the lights reappear from right to left until 5 lights were showing, and then it did it for a second time before it disappeared.  the lights we saw with the naked eye were yellowish orange in color.  if you look on www.Wwki.Com, click on the article about the boom and the bright lights, you will see pictures that someone submitted.  the fourth picture down is exactly what i saw when i first looked out.  this was no meteor or f-16, they don't hover.  we could not take our eyes off of it, and my husband, who is a viet nam veteran and a retired deputy sheriff said he had never seen anything like it.  we are both certain that what we saw was unidentifiable.  the next morning, when i went out to get the newspaper at a little after 5 a.M., i looked off into the west in the same vicinity, and there, in front of the moon was a huge v-shaped dark cloud that reminded me of a flower vase with alot of much smaller jet trails near it.
content.summary: Strange object in the sky with approx.5 rotating lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: On april 16 at 10:30pm we were home watching tv and there was a loud boom like an explosion we went out to check on things when in the western sky there was 2lights that looked like headlights then they disappeared and reappeared the third time they seemed to spread from side to side until there was about 6 or 7 lights they disappeared and then reappeared all in the same spot. they were a very bright white and seemed very low and close. after they disappeared we began looking all around the sky, when we noticed a bright light that looked like a star off in the distance as it caught my attention i noticed it was flashing different colors, my husband thought i was crazy. he went and got the binocculars and discovered it was changing color. it looked like it was disc shape with the lights on the bottom that were blinking. it stayed in the same place the whole hour we were watching it. the next evening april 17 at 10:30pm we decided to go out and see if it was there. sure enough it was in the same spot again. on the morning of april 18 at 5:35am we felt the house shake and we ran outside to see if the light was still there, it was not there. there was an erie feeling in the air and a weird sound that i can't describe. i have never seen anything like it before. i was pretty shaken by all of this.
content.summary: Looks like a star but it changes color and is like a disc shape it stays in the same place

content.detailedDescription:
This happened at 5:30am this morning and woke me from my sleep
the entire earth was shaking... i awoke to find things slaming onto the floor from night stand and dresser

a day before i heard of booms, lights, and shaking taking place some miles from me and "supposedly" the air guard was training 
<_<
>_>
...At 11:00pm...
<_<
>_>
...Over civilian homes...

anyway my first thought was not safty or earthquake but those mysterious booms and shaking... i jumped to the end of my bed as fast as my feet could carry me and low and behold what do i see go right over my home but a large white pop in the dark sky it was so bright that for a split second i had to shut my eyes!
i heard no noise but after this last flash the ground stopped shaking a few seconds after... but the report from the events in the incident from nights earlier a few counties over said that fighter planes were training at 11:00pm fire tracer rounds and going sub-sonic... now, that said my brother in law was in the 82nd airborne and i know enough from his 16 years of military service to know that training missions dont take place and sub-sonic speeds... jeez... why dont they just say its swamp gas so that atleast we will know they are lying and just dont care... atleast that would make themselfs look smarter... agreed? 

also... had these been fighters going sub-sonic over my home i would have heard the sonic boom from their planes spliting the air... also last time i checked the military had special grounds for training missions... not over civilian homes! 
i stayed up for about 1 hour after this... the news had breaking coverage of whatever happened and say it was a "possible earth quake"... this in itself raises some interesting questions... why would they not simply say "earth quake"... usually when the ground shakes you dont put the word "possible" in from of the quake part... atleast thats just what i found curious
now this may very well have been an earth quake in the first place... but whatever rocked the country side only the night before not far away was at it again during this event at 5:30am... best guess is that whatever these ufo's are doing... they miss-timed their activities and might have thought this earth quake was going to take place the night everyone reported it the first time a few counties over... atleast they got their timing right this morning... but i still saw them!

please! feel free to email me or contact me in anyway... i really want to talk to people that saw these things the other night!
content.summary: Booms, and violent vibration and shacking of the land

content.detailedDescription: My friend and myself were snake hunting in june of 1968. we were on route 160 about 30 miles sw of las vegas on the way to pahrump nv. we stopped about 20 miles from pahrump on the side of the road. it was around 9 pm or so and we noticed a bright egg shape white moon colored object over the city of pahrump....Hovering around a mile up. we observed the object for about 20 mins and then resumed our rest. as we started to leave we noticed the object now was above our heads maybe 1000 feet and standing still. no noise, but seeing this object hovering above us scared us half to death and we imediately got into car and sped away.
content.summary: Lighted objected over city of pahrump and then over our car

content.detailedDescription:
Driving to work through a section of north arlington va i noticed an extremly bright light in the crystal clear sky. the object was odd, it had an egg shape with no visable wings, blades, markings, windows, ect. if it had a color at all i'd say it was white, but it was more of a "glowing" white.
it was 4:23 pm wednesday only hours after the popes speach in dc so at first i thought it could be some kind of secret vadican aircraft. after slowing the car and rolling down the window i poked my head out to watch the object; it had been on a direct straight path moving south from dc at a slower pace, 100-200mph. it then began to move upwards when it changed speed and climbed vertically at a rediculous pace. it was gone within 1.5 secs.
i go to work at the exact same time every day and pass through that section of arlington at the same time mon- fri, and i viewed the very same object yesterday at the same time, same movement, ect...I'm hoping to make it three in a row today, this time i'll have my camera!
content.summary: Very bright white oval shaped object over dc/ northern va 2 days in a row

content.detailedDescription:
It appeared as lines created by the contrails of the jets (ufo's) ? tha created three lines that crossed in the middle as an astric .
*
in the few seconds, less than a minute when i had retreived my camera and made the pictures the jets/ufo's had disapeared.
when i went into the house there were sis in all with three of them making an x when i went for the cameria. the third one was heading in the direction of making the final pass.

i'm right much a sky watcher and noticed the six jets/ufo's or whatever and i was wondering why so many in such a short space in the southern sky. as i watched the action began.

as i have picture i desired to share but so far have found no place to send it on this site.
content.summary: * astric - three stight lins that interceted in the middle. ans astric.

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time i have witnessed this, and the first for my husband. last night, i had gone outside to smoke a cigarette. i looked up at the sky, as i usually do. it was a really bright night, with a bright moon. i instantly noticed the unusual star like object changing colors. this time i was kind of excited and nervous. (the first time, about a month ago, when i saw the object, it made me very nervous, it was so unusual. i just stood there amazed at the object. the first time i witnessed this, i saw only one, and watched it for about 15 minutes, and when my husband came out, it dissappeared.) this time, i went in a got my husband quickly. when he came out, he walked over to the open area by my house and spotted a second object farther to the right of the first object, changing colors and moving like the first object. these objects were lower in the sky than the airplanes that passed by and much brighter. they were flashing from red to green. they would move slowly toward us and then further away, continuously moving in a specific circular pattern. we watched these for about an hour, until midnight, when we decided to go in and go to bed. i kept telling my husband, i can't believe we are the only ones seeing this.  it was so unusual. the only millitary base near here is much further to the south than where these "lights" were spotted.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two star like changing colors from red to green, moving in circular motion

content.detailedDescription: Took picture of full moon and did not see anything on phone until looking later, the date was 2 /22/08, have a very strange one second video on my phone same color as what was seen in the picture. i can hear some kind of air blast and an orange recangular object moving towards the ground i believe. i have no idea how it got on my phone. i have awakened several times in the night during the last year completly wet from some kind of liquid from shoulder to knees. i have witnessed ufos for many years. i would like for you to contact me and see if you can get the picture and video on your computers and enhance the images. i would also not be against hypnotic regression.
content.summary: Have two on my cell phone-one taking picture of moon, and on at 0331 did not know how 1 sec video got on phone
